requirements.summary: Remove the CertificationsGallery component import and render from the main App.tsx component
acceptanceCriteria: The CertificationsGallery component is no longer imported in App.tsx
The <CertificationsGallery /> element is removed from the component tree
The portfolio renders without the certifications gallery section

file_operations.description: Remove the import statement for CertificationsGallery from the component imports at the top of the file. Remove the <CertificationsGallery /> element from the JSX component tree while maintaining the existing layout structure and spacing between remaining sections (Hero, Professional Summary, Core Competencies, Education, Professional Certifications, Professional Experience, Research Papers, Interests, and Footer).

requirements.summary: Delete the CertificationsGallery.tsx component file from frontend/src/components/
acceptanceCriteria: The frontend/src/components/CertificationsGallery.tsx file is removed from the project

file_operations.description: Delete the CertificationsGallery.tsx component file that displays 54 professional certification images in a responsive grid with click-to-expand modal functionality.

requirements.summary: Delete the CertificateModal.tsx component file from frontend/src/components/
acceptanceCriteria: The frontend/src/components/CertificateModal.tsx file is removed from the project

file_operations.description: Delete the CertificateModal.tsx component file that provides the full-screen modal view for certificates with navigation controls and keyboard support.
